main_topic.author: JamshaidSohail
main_topic.title: Notebook timeout problem
main_topic.content: Hi. The notebook which was working extremely fine in the past few days. Now is timing out on submission. Please, it would be nice to fix this. [@sohier](https://www.kaggle.com/sohier) [@paultimothymooney](https://www.kaggle.com/paultimothymooney)

reply.content: Glad to see the response from no.1 in this competition. The submissions are getting wasted and no new ideas are being able to be tested out :/
